title: Introduce clear log message when dataset/repo config is reloaded (or attempted to be reloaded)
body:
At maximum debug level (`1`), a reload attempt that leads to no `git-config` reload leaves no message at all.

A reload when a file change in `.git/config` was detected looks like this:

```
[DEBUG  ] run:
|  cwd=/tmp/some
|  cmd=['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin'] 
[DEBUG  ] Process 105473 started 
[DEBUG  ] ReaderThread(<_io.FileIO name=16 mode='rb' closefd=True>, <queue.Queue object at 0x7fb5316b7b80>, ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']) started 
[DEBUG  ] ReaderThread(<_io.FileIO name=13 mode='rb' closefd=True>, <queue.Queue object at 0x7fb5316b7b80>, ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']) started 
[Level 5] Read 1024 bytes from 105473[stdout] 
[DEBUG  ] ReaderThread(<_io.FileIO name=13 mode='rb' closefd=True>, <queue.Queue object at 0x7fb5316b7b80>, ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']) exiting (stream end) 
[DEBUG  ] ReaderThread(<_io.FileIO name=16 mode='rb' closefd=True>, <queue.Queue object at 0x7fb5316b7b80>, ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']) exiting (stream end) 
[Level 5] Read 1024 bytes from 105473[stdout] 
[Level 5] Read 283 bytes from 105473[stdout] 
[DEBUG  ] Process 105473 exited with return code 0 
[Level 8] Finished running ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin'] with status 0 
```

A config update can be inferred, but is not announced.

A forced reload looks like this:

```

|  cmd=['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']

[DEBUG  ] ReaderThread(<_io.FileIO name=16 mode='rb' closefd=True>, <queue.Queue object at 0x7fb5316c2310>, ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']) exiting (stream end) 
[DEBUG  ] ReaderThread(<_io.FileIO name=13 mode='rb' closefd=True>, <queue.Queue object at 0x7fb5316c2310>, ['git', 'config', '-z', '-l', '--show-origin']) exiting (stream end)

[DEBUG  ] run:
```
